publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3605 Jackie Baillie: Citizens of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates Barbara Barnes and Elizabeth Hartley on winning the Vale and Dumbarton citizens of the year respectively; applauds Barbara Barnes for her work with various groups within the area, including Macmillan Cancer Support and Alzheimer Scotland’s Carers Group among others; notes the contribution that she has made to charity, taking part in many fund-raising events such as parachute jumps, zip slides and fire walking; praises Elizabeth Hartley on running a companion club for pensioners and her personal care for an elderly friend, despite her own ill-health, and welcomes the deserved recognition bestowed on these two model citizens by the local community.
